title: Day of the Cheetah
description: In this explosive  New York Times bestseller, Dale Brown creates a shattering scenario of the ultimate race for technology...America’s most advanced fighter plane, DreamStar , has been hijacked. To retrieve it, Lt. Col. Patrick McLanahan takes on his most perilous assignment since The Flight of the Old Dog . The odds are against him. His aircraft, the Cheetah , hasn’t the speed, the power, or the technology of the DreamStar —his skills behind the stick are the only advantage he’s got. And so begins the greatest high-flying chase of all time...
author: Dale Brown
